Well, if you are looking for a war or combat type of simulation game, this game might be the one of the worst when compared to the others, since its rather an aim simulator. It has many issues like the fact that it is not realistic in terms of damage and respond, or some other mechanics lets say. HOWEVER, it has a kind of a structure that you can insert your tactical skills as a group or as a person during the match, and this really depends on how you come up with an algorithm against your opponent that would eventually make you win even though you might be less talanted than them. Therefore, I thinks its like playing chess but in a vary different way of course :D
